let us load the data

````{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
rawdata<- read.csv("./activity.csv")
````

calculating the number of steps taking each day
````{r}
data<- group_by(rawdata, date)
data1<- as.data.frame(summarize(data, steps= sum(steps, na.rm= TRUE)))
````


making a histogram of total number of steps taken each day
````{r}
plot(data1$steps, type="h", xlab="days(oct- nov)", ylab="steps")
````

calculating mean and median
````{r}
mean<- mean(data1$steps)
mean
median<- median(data1$steps)
median
````

calculating number of na values in the dataset
````{r}
sum_na<- length(which(is.na(rawdata$steps)))
sum_na
````
